author: TrustyJAID
description: Various role utility commands. Including Reaction roles, Sticky roles, and Auto role.
end_user_data_statement:
This cog stores User ID's for the purposes of re-assigning roles when the user re-joins a server.
User ID's may be stored in the bots log information.
install_msg: The command group is `[p]roletools`. Remember that role names are case sensitive.
name: RoleTools
